title: Update homepage hero headline to mention sweets and snacks

requirements.text: Update the Home page hero headline text to replace "Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Foods" with "Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Sweets & Snacks" (English, properly capitalized).

quotes:
instead of Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Foods
can u make it uthentic Kerala Spices & Traditional sweets&snacks

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the main hero <h1> no longer contains the word "Foods".
The hero <h1> displays exactly: "Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Sweets & Snacks".
No other user-facing text is changed as part of this update.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
nonGoals: Do not change product catalog data, categories, or images.
Do not reintroduce cart/checkout UI or flows.
